about_the_game:
The massive sequel to Shadow of Azrael is here! Take control of over a dozen unique characters and experience high octane, high powered combat like never before! Fight with combatants that can fly, shoot massive beam attacks, move at super speeds, and level up as the combat progresses. Highly customizable options also allows you to take control and create your own fighting experience. Turn down the combat to a normal street fight or crank it up to eleven and watch your fighters fly. The choice is up to you how you want to fight!



Featuring:
• 4-Player Local Smash-like combat with RPG elements.
• 19 playable characters and 6 new fighters with their own unique abilities.
• New alternate colors, Improved graphics, new new moves and new animations.
• New stages and a new stage select screen.
• New grabbing and throwing abilities.
• Contest your enormous beam attacks during Beam Struggles.
• Improved AI that are more human-like.
• New items and special effects.



Coming soon:
• In-depth player guides and game instructions.
• An improved campaign and story mode with in-depth lore.
• Button Mapping and control customization.


Be sure to check out and follow our Steam Store for more titles from Dream Within.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: XInput controller recommended

short_description: The sequel to the epic platform fighter! Featuring 4-Player combat in a fast paced, high-powered battle royale. Fly, blast, and power-up with a brand new experience that blends fighting with RPG elements in a unique way!
